title: CHQ Backend
content: Coders(hq) backend where our other tools and services can connect to it using an API.

title: CHQ Interface
content: Admin panel, CLI and other smaller projects which gives an interface to the backend.

title: CHQ Bounty
content: A board where companies can post challenges and coders can compete to solve them.

title: Auxiliary Projects
content: Are a group of partner projects that are impactful but are not core CHQ projects.
